base_description: Cylindrical silver trash can with foot pedal.
part_description: Includes a cylindrical body, a domed lid, and a rectangular foot pedal at the bottom front. The body is tall and smooth, with the pedal positioned centrally at the base.
internal_interaction_description: The foot pedal, when pressed, lifts the lid via an internal lever mechanism. This allows for hands-free opening of the trash can. The lid is designed to close automatically when the pedal is released, ensuring containment of waste and odors.
external_interaction_description: The trash can interacts with users who press the foot pedal to open the lid. It is designed to fit in kitchens or bathrooms, providing a hygienic way to dispose of waste without hand contact. Its size and shape allow it to fit neatly against walls or in corners.
